title.narrative: ACCCRN Urban Climate Change Resilience (UCCR) Network Transition

description.narrative: Within a five year timeframe Mercy Corps intends to facilitate setup of a network governance structure and transition from network custodian to participant, to have identified and secured funding streams to sustain network expansion and stability into the future, and to have laid the basis for scaling and replication of UCCR activities through a robust and regional practitioner network.

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity
